extendedInfo.description: Tawk is the most comprehensive voice command app available on the Market. It leverages the power of voice recognition to control your phone and your web browser.  Tawk is free and always will be.Add the Tawk widget for instant access+++ Ask any WHO, WHAT, WHY or WHEN question!- Who is Mahatma Ghandi?- What is a armadillo?- What is the capital of Brazil?- Show the tallest building the world- Show me the human brain- Why is the Sky blue?- When is next World Cup?+++ We recommend browsing What Can I Say? before using this appTawk can be accessed via the main app, the notification tray or a homescreen widgetHere are a few things you can control with your voice:* Phone Volume* Wifi State* Bluetooth State* Display/Volume/Brightness settings* Manage applications* Launch apps* Download apps* Send email* Send SMS* Make phone calls (say: call [contact])* Get news & weather* Find pictures & videos* Search using your preferred search provider (defaults to Google)* And more...++ NOW WITH AUDIO SUPPORTTawk can now speak! Every time Tawk responds to an action it tells you what it's doing.  It also reads out all text-only responses (e.g. What's the date today?)++ DICTATETurn on dictate mode or preface your command with "dictate ..." and whatever you say will be copied to the clipboard, and can then be pasted into any text field.++ SAMPLE COMMMANDSHere are a few things you can say.  Check out our webpage for hundreds more examples:call 911wifivolumewhat is a flower?who is bill clinton?displayapplicationsLaunch Skypecall Johnsend sms to Papa I'll be there at 8pmdownload Google Earthyahoo.comOpen gmailSearch for father's day 2012what time is it in Dubai?what's the distance to the moon?what is a armadillo?what is the best restaurant in new york city?show me the tallest building in the worldHow much does gas cost in San Francisco?What's the weather in New York City?Facebook messageseBay summaryShow me pictures of cute dogsSearch youtube for funny videosMute the volumeTurn bluetooth onTurn wifi offWhen is Harry Potter playing in Santa Cruz?Show the filmography for tom cruisesearch wikipedia for medicare recovery asset programhow much is gas in santa cruz californiai want to see pictures of peopleclose windowgoto reddit.comfind love on wikipediaopen slashdot.comopen google docsdownload google bodywhat's the capital of Texas?Check out http://www.tawkalot.com/what for a full list of commands available++ CONTROLLING YOUR PHONE'S BROWSER ++Say any url to load it in your browserSay "search for [query]" to search the InternetSay "download [app name]" to download an Android app++ CONTROLLING YOUR PC/MAC BROWSER (Pro version only) ++A unique feature of Tawk Pro is that you can actually speak commands into your phone and control your PC/Mac browser.  Install the Tawk web extension and use a single passphrase to connect your phone and PC/Mac browser.  Then start speaking commands into your phone, and your PC/Mac browser will respond.++ CREATE YOUR OWN COMMANDS ++Visit http://www.tawkalot.com/manage to create your own custom commands that control your phone or Internet browser.  Commands can be simple, matching only a single phrase, or have infinite levels of complexity, encompassing many different phrases, including user input and optional sections.++ FEEDBACK ++Please send us any suggestions, requests for new commands, as well as any bugs you encounter.++ WANT TO TAWK-ENABLE YOUR WEBSITE? ++You can voice-enable your website by inserting two lines of code that make a TawkBox appear and let users speak command directly within your web page!  Check out our website for more details.++ WANT TO USE TAWK ON YOUR PC OR MAC? ++ Use your PC or Mac microphone to browse the Internet.  Check out our free Google Chrome Extension on our website.Keywords: voice commands, voice actions, voice recognition, speech recognition, voice control, voice activation

reviews.title: No dedicated button
reviews.comment: Has custom commands that need improving. No dedicated button option like Google voice search makes it very hard to use.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I gave it one Star coz\' it didnt allow anything less. Hate apps, which experiment in the MARKET. This is work in progress, stay away.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: you can\'t say everything but it recognizes all of the commands in the database. this 1 has huge potential if polished up
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: This actually works pretty well. I like the new text to speech feature.
reviews.author: A Google User
